body: Just melt a whole box of chocolate Ex-Lax in a mug and then tell him you're just gonna go check on something while your "hot cocoa cools off." Then once that little bald prick ganks it you can sing the Grandpa Joe part of "I've got a golden ticket" while you watch him shit himself to death.
